response.homeDescription: Customize your dream home while this house is still under renovation! This price includes new windows, new HVAC/Central Air, privacy fence, new electric, new water heater. Also included in the price, your choice of brand new kitchen and bathroom, from the granite counter tops to the cabinets, stainless steel appliances, paint, etc. The house includes a detached 2 car garage but would you also like an extra driveway in the front? An extra bathroom? A finished basement? Custom walk in closet? Alarm system, cable run? etc No problem! All of this can be negotiated above asking. Contact the agent right now to come and see quickly to get in with enough time to customize before the renovations are complete!
response.whatOwnerLoves:
Customize your dream house $164,900 on large lot with large shed and 2 car garage! Pick your brand new kitchen, bathroom, privacy fence and windows. Brand new water heater, electric and HVAC. Choose if you want a paved driveway, finished basement, extra bathroom, etc. Currently 3beds, 1 bath under construction. Sits next to large park and Anne Arundel county, located in Baltimore 21225
Call or email Amanda Beale at Exit Preferred Realty 410-407-3866 or idealinvestmentinc@gmail.com
